title: The ratio of the present ages of two boys is 7:9. If the ratio of their ages after 4 years will be 4:5, then what are their present ages? - Quora

response.answer_text: The ratio of the present ages of two boys is 7:9. Let the rational between present ages of two boys be x. Thus the ages of the boys are 7x and 9x. If the ratio of their ages after 4 years will be 4:5, In 4 years from now their ages will be (7x+4) and (9x+4). The ratio between their ages (7x + 4) / (9x + 4) = 4 / 5 Cross multiplication 4 (9x + 4) = 5 (7x + 4) 36x + 16 = 35x + 20 36x - 35x = 20 - 16 x = 4 The rational is 4, this their respective ages One boy = 7x = 7 × 4 = 28 years Other boy = 9x = 9 × 4 = 36 years Thus the present ages of two boys are 28 years and 36 years. Answer the present ages of two boys are 28 years and 36 years

The ages of the boys are 7x and 9x. In 4 years from now their ages will be (7x+4) and (9x+4). Hence (7x+4) : (9x+4) = 4:5 or 5(7x+4) = 4(9x+4) or 35x + 20 = 36x + 16, or x = 4. So their present ages are 28 years and 36 years. Really OLD BOYS, who would be earning their living!

Look at a solution without algebra Ratio of Present age = 7:9 Ratio after 4 years = 4:5 = 8:10 Now, look at the difference between numerator & denominator in both ratios. It is 2 in both cases. Take difference of numerators of both ratios & denominators of both ratios. It is 1 in both cases. => For a gap of 1 year, present ages would be 7 & 9. If gap is 4 years, present ages would be 7x4 & 9x4 => 28 & 36 years Some food for thought for mathematics lovers who are addicted to algebra. Find out why the above method works everytime without fail. :-)

Ratio of present age of boys = 7:9 After 4 years the ratio between their ages will change to 4:5Let the present age of boy A =7x years and boy B =9x yearsAfter 4 years their ages will be (7x+4) and (9x+4) years respectively.According to the given condition : (7x+4) : (9x+4) = 4:5 => 4(9x+4) = 5(7x+4) => 36x+16 = 35x+20 => 36x-35x=20–16 => x=4So the present age of boy A=7x=7(4)=28 yearsand the present age of boy B=9x=9(4)=36 years(Thus the required answer is 28 years & 36 years)
Let n be the common multiple between their ages. Then: 7n+4/9n+4=4/5 35n+20=36n+16 n=4 Thus: 7n=28 9n=36 The “boys” are 28 and 36 ☺☺☺☺
